# verses

--

## obtain
`[xonsh] pip install verses`

--

## school
`[xonsh] verses school`

--

## structure
```
	/verses_1
		/mints
		/trends
		/treasures
			/treasure.1
			/treasure.2
		
		verses_essence.py
			essence = {}
```

## on
From a directory that is after the "verses_essence.py" file.   
```
[@ verses_1] verses ventures on
```


## enumerate treasures
```
[@ verses_1] verses treasures enumerate
```
